code.dws.core.propertyMap

Class GenerateAssociations

  • java.lang.Object
    • code.dws.core.propertyMap.GenerateAssociations

  • public class GenerateAssociations
extends java.lang.Object
    This creates the domain/range restrictions for a given set of OIE relations. The valid input file is the fPlus file, because thats where we can find a KB assertion and domain/range values, fMinus is useless for the pattern learning stuff.
    Author:
    Arnab Dutta
